attributes.action: grant the right of return to descendants of St Kilda island residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition calls on the Prime Minister to grant the right of return to the descendants of St Kilda island residents who may wish to return to their ancestral homes. Provide assistance to those who want to move back to the island, renovate and occupy their inherited properties.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
